name: react-es6-app-example
description: React ES6 App Example ---- Demo ---- [http://tonyspiro.com/dev/react-es6-app-example/](http://tonyspiro.com/dev/react-es6-app-example/) Why ---- This is a simple example app that demonstrates how to build component-based apps using React and ES6.  The app connects to the github API and displays a github user card using material design lite.
author: Tony Spiro <tspiro@tonyspiro.com> (http://tonyspiro.com/)
